title: How would the public react to a fiction book that has justified (not really) terrorism or terrorism that tries to be justified? - Quora

response.answer_text: Random, average people think that a highway robber called Robin Hood was a hero. More recently, they have adored a fictional pirate called Jack Sparrow, despite the fact that real pirates rape, steal and kill, not necesarrily in that order. Write your terrorist as a real character. Make your reader inderstand how and why he became what he is. The readers will love it
